title: This got out of hand...
body: Well you can say I'm quite frustrated..everything started yesterday in my diamond promos, I was 2-1 and attempted to promote, for apparently no reason I'm not able to connect to my next game no matter how hard I tried to reconnect, of course resulting in a remake and my loss.. 2-2 np I'll just try the next one aaand same thing happened couldnt connect nor reconnect >remake> my loss..get low prio queued 5 mins for 5 games, did a full repair on the client and things began working, fine I deserve this maybe for being impatient..and now today I get attempted to reconnect randomly, not my internet because I was able to open youtube/download stuff etc. so I restart my PC and now everything works fine, unfortunately a ~8min afk is too much to recover from resulting in a loss and also a 5 game 10min low prio queue... I don't know how to feel about this game anymore :'(

replies.body:
It's never a good idea to keep hopping into queues when your connection keeps cutting out. If this starts happening again, let's be sure to take a step back and try troubleshooting this to make sure the issue is solved before jumping into ranked or matchmade games. Make sure to test these steps in a custom or practice match first. 

Let's first make sure your network is able to get a clean connection with our game servers but checking up on your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). Run through the steps in that guide, paying close attention to port forwarding, firewalls, and flushing your DNS and you should be able to get a smoother link with our servers.
